disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is general architectural design advice and should not replace professional architectural consultation. The information provided may be inaccurate or incomplete. Always consult with a licensed architect for detailed design plans. Disclaimer.

rooms.description: Central living space with modern aesthetics and natural lighting.
Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom oriented towards the east as per Vastu principles for positive energy.
Secondary bedroom placed in a quiet corner of the floor plan.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and sufficient ventilation.
Contemporary kitchen integrated with smart appliances, positioned away from the main entrance as per Vastu guidelines to avoid negative energy flows.
Modern home theater designed for optimal acoustics and viewing experience; located in a dedicated entertainment zone with soundproofing.
Primary bathroom attached to the master bedroom; positioned according to local building norms for privacy and accessibility.
Secluded dining area near the kitchen and living room for comfortable meals.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed to welcome positive energy while ensuring security.
Balcony window for enhanced natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Dedicated service entrance for efficient movement of household items and deliveries.
Accessible garage door near the kitchen for utility vehicles, ensuring compliance with local zoning norms.
